[conjecture_answer] Formal Problem Statement: import Mathlib

open Nat Topology Filter

abbrev omnimath803_answer : ℝ := sorry
theorem omnimath803
(x y : ℝ)
(hxy : -1 < x ∧ x < y ∧ y < 1)
(G G' : ℝ)
(hG : G = x / (1 - y))
(hG' : G' = y / (1 - x))
(hGG' : G = G')
: x + y = omnimath803_answer := by sorry. Enumerated answers: Searching for x and y where x/(1-y) = y/(1-x) with -1 < x < y < 1
